title: need help
body: i would like to know how to refund champions and how to to get the free champion skins with the new patch plz

replies.body:
As to how you can refund champions, you can still do that in the store!  Once you open the store in the client, navigate to the upper right hand corner where you will seen a person and a cogwheel button.  Click that, and in the new window that appears, look at the far left hand side where it says "Purchase History" right under "Account".  You should then see the items you can refund.

As for your second question about free champion skins, what do you mean exactly?  What Free Champ skins are you referring to?  Let me know!
